name: BREADSKATE Demo
description:
BREADSKATE (also known as BRDSKT) is a game about skating... On bread!

Demo contains Level editor to build your own custom skateparks for your newly baken breadskate! 

You can share your custom parks with friends and people in the community and just load it up in the main menu. 

Level editor controls are similar to default Unity editor controls:
  • Hold RMB to look around
  • WASD to move while holding RMB
  • Press LMB to select an object (Hold to select multiple or if pressing doesn't work)
  • W - Position editing; E - Rotation; R - Scaling;

Full game is going to be released on Steam in 2022 with a story mode, freemode, custom breadskates and multiplayer!

Loved the soundtrack? Check out more songs from MelkuMan on his soundcloud page! Some money from donations will go to pay for his music that will be used in game.
